name: Suspicious PowerShell Mailbox Export to Share
description: Detects a PowerShell New-MailboxExportRequest that exports a mailbox to a local share, as used in ProxyShell exploitations
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.command_line:*New\-MailboxExport* AND process.command_line:*\ \-Mailbox\ * AND process.command_line:*\ \-FilePath\ \\\\127.0.0.1\\C$*)`
